facid:LocationAddress.facid:LocationDescriptionText: Facility can be found two blocks south of Burnside.

facid:VerticalCollectionMethod.facid:MethodName: GPS Carrier Phase Kinematic Relative Position
facid:VerticalCollectionMethod.facid:MethodDescriptionText: The geographic coordinate determination method based on GPS carrier phase kinematic relative positioning technique.
